subject: Order #SSN5380 Change of shipping address
description_text:
Hi I have made an error in my shipping address for this order, it had
defaulted to my old address, could I please have this updated to my new
address (409A 12 Nancarrow Avenue , Ryde 2112 NSW Australia) which is my
new default address

conversations.body_text: Hi Armah Okai,    We apologize for the delayed response. Your order has already been shipped, and we are attempting to intercept it.
